headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts
content:
If you're tired of listening to the hum and thud of bass outside the club, buy your way in: Nightclubs are 40% off this week, while their Upgrades and Modifications are 30% off. There are also a range of vehicles on sale, should you need a new Festival Bus or Blimp to ferry your entourage around with:

- Dinka Jester Classic - 40% off
- Pfister Neon - 40% off
- Ocelot Pariah - 40% off
- Blimp - 40% off

And more! Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
